items.summary: Update the HomePage component to display the CreatePostForm above the post feed, allowing authenticated users to create posts that appear in the general feed without specifying a section

Verify that the CreatePostForm component is properly integrated into the SectionPage component for Civil Debate, Aggressive Debate, Quotes & Poems, and Random Debates sections, ensuring authenticated users can create section-specific posts

Add visual feedback and success messaging to the CreatePostForm component so users receive confirmation when their post is successfully created, including clearing the form fields and optionally scrolling to show the new post in the feed
